general.exerciseCompletedMessage: Great job! You've completed this exercise. Ready to continue your journey?

rythemGame.welcome: Hi {name}! Let's play a rhyming game!
rythemGame.instructions: Let's play a fun rhyming game!
rythemGame.title: Rhyme Time!

rythemPlay.title: Rhyme Time
rythemPlay.intro: Get ready to find rhyming words!
rythemPlay.question: What rhymes with:

talkAnimals.welcome: Welcome to Animal Friends! Tap the big green button to play!
talkAnimals.title: Animal Friends
talkAnimals.start: Let's play with our animal friends!
talkAnimals.footer: Made with ♥ for little animal lovers!
talkAnimals.gameOverMessage: Wow! You did it! You talked to all our animal friends! Great job!

assessment.chooseAssessment: Choose an assessment type to begin.

speechQuiz.instructions: Hi {name}! You'll complete three fun exercises to test your fine motor skills, speech and communication skills. Each exercise is designed to be engaging and age-appropriate.

cognitiveQuiz.instructions: Hi {name}! You'll complete three fun exercises to test your memory, attention, and problem-solving skills. Each exercise is designed to be engaging and age-appropriate.

otQuiz.instructions: Hi {name}! You'll complete three fun exercises to test your fine motor skills, coordination and reaction time. Each exercise is designed to be engaging and age-appropriate.
